description: This file defines a Redux slice for managing tasks in a project management application, including actions and reducers for creating, moving, updating, and deleting tasks.

methods.name: createTask
methods.description: Creates a new task with default properties and a unique ID, then adds it to the state.

methods.name: moveTask
methods.description: Updates the status of a task, moving it between columns if the status is valid.

methods.name: updateTask
methods.description: Applies partial updates to an existing task based on provided changes.

methods.name: deleteTask
methods.description: Removes a task from the state by its ID.
